Source.Name: ffe
Source.Summary: ffe is a program for extracting fields from flat file records and displaying them in different formats.
Source.Description: ffe is a program for extracting fields from flat file records and displaying them in different formats. ffe relies on the configuration file to control input file structure and the output format.

Package.Name: ffe
Package.Summary: ffe is a program for extracting fields from flat file records and displaying them in different formats.
Package.Description: ffe is a program for extracting fields from flat file records and displaying them in different formats. ffe relies on the configuration file to control input file structure and the output format.
